changelog:
Syberia OS for chiron updated!

Current build date: 12/07/2018
Minimum firmware required: 10.0.2.0 (latest stable)
Minimum TWRP required: 3.2.3 (wight554's one) or latest OrangeFox

!!!WARNING!!!!
!!!CLEAN INSTALLATION IS HIGLY RECOMMENDED!!!!

Enable Wipe DATA in ADVANCED options before install!

(psttt ; you may not need clean installation. just DISABLE EVERY THEME OVERLAY (before update) and delete these 2 files : "/data/system/package_cache/1/Settings-16" and "/data/system/package_cache/1/SystemUI-16". if no luck, you have to clean install. )

Changelog:

new:
- Android 9.0.0_R21 (December security patch)
- Font Manager
- Fully customizable Smart NavBar
- Link notification volume option
- Disable locksreen charging info option
- Hide check button when using PIN quick unlock
- Screenrecord HQ quality now 1920x1080


fixed:
- Miracast (WFD)
- Sensors issues on clean install
- Other various fixes

Download:  check OTA or visit our Downloads Portal https://syberiaos.com/downloads

#syberia #chiron #donate
